snippet.title: Magic and Machines - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now!
iOS - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/magic-and-machines/id6446097904
Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.LittleBearStudios.MagicandMachines
Steam (Demo available)- https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341800/Magic_and_Machines/
itch.io - https://littlebearstudios.itch.io/magic-and-machines

Press Kit - https://www.littlebear.studio/press/mam-press-kit

Magic and Machines is on mobile (iOS and Android) and Steam (Windows and macOS)

Journey into the world of Magic and Machines, a retro fantasy turn-based RPG. Follow six characters on their journey to save the world.
